description:
An invisible apparition (thus: no picture) consisting of many individual http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawks].
They can`t move without restrictions as these ghosts are bound to a certain location. But they are just flexible enough to cause a significant disaster in Tokyo and many casualties including a http://anidb.net/ch25884 [little girl] whose http://anidb.net/ch25870 [mother] has to watch this event helplessly.
The apparition senses in http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur] a blood relative of http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur] who banned these ghosts to Tokyo Bay Bridge long ago.
name: Gattai Youma
